testcase.classname: Validate Find Doctors functionality on Apollo Pharmacy website
testcase.name: Search with invalid specialty
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Find Doctors page......................................passed When User clicks on Dermatology and navigates to Dermatologist page.........passed Then User enters an invalid specialty in the search bar.....................passed And clicks on the Search button.............................................passed Then The system should display No result found message......................passed
